title: Spectacle Talks: Hello Flux Panel Discussion
abstract: The curators and designer of the ACMI Exhibition 'Spectacle: The Music Video Exhibition', join local practitioners in a panel discussion about the exhibition and the art of the music video.
description: A special panel discussion held at ACMI on 26th September 2013. Exhibition curators Jonathan Wells and Meg Grey Wells joined an extended panel that included Alexei Tylevich (the designer of ‘Spectacle: The Music Video Exhibition’) and Australian music video directors Darcy Prendergast, Josh Thomas, Luci Schroder and Kris Moyes. Moderated by ACMI curator Amita Kirpalani, the panel discusses the exhibition, personal experiences in production and the art of the music video. Filmed as part of ‘Spectacle: The Music Video Exhibition’ 26 September 2013 - 23 February 2014.
